## BatchResult interface

Result of a batch operation (map, parallel, or concurrent execution)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface BatchResult<TResult>
```

</td></tr>

[started()](./durable-execution-sdk-js.batchresult.started.md)

</td><td>

</td></tr>
